Name: assign_worker_to_task
Description: Binary decision to assign a worker to a task

Name: select_feature_for_sprint
Description: Binary decision to include a feature in a sprint

Name: allocated_budget
Description: Continuous amount of budget allocated to a feature

Name: team_size
Description: Integer number of workers in a team

Name: sprint_duration
Description: Integer length of a sprint in days

Name: worker_availability
Description: Percentage of time a worker is available

Name: story_point_estimate
Description: Integer story points assigned to a user story

Name: task_effort_estimate
Description: Integer hours estimated for a task

Name: blocker_severity_level
Description: Ordinal level of a blocker's severity

Name: sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Percentage of the sprint goal achieved
